item.title: Estonia now officially worst country in EU for Bitcoin, blockchain tokens and assets * /r/Bitcoin
item.description:
Estonia now officially worst country in EU for Bitcoin, blockchain tokens and assets * /r/Bitcoin

Yesterday the Estonian Supreme Court ruled in my Bitcoin case. The state and some media claimed that the court decided to treat Bitcoin like any...

item.title: MMM Global Closes Republic of Bitcoin, an Alleged Ponzi Scheme
item.description:
MMM Global Closes Republic of Bitcoin, an Alleged Ponzi Scheme

MMM Global has announced that it is closing its Republic of Bitcoin, a website promising up to 100% returns on donations. The company, called a "Ponzi" scheme by many, stated in a blog that the Republic of Bitcoin was an experiment that has failed.

item.title: Claymore's New Dual Ethereum and Decred AMD GPU Beta Miner
item.description:
Claymore's New Dual Ethereum and Decred AMD GPU Beta Miner

Here is something quite interesting for the people that mine either Ethereum (ETH) or Decred (DCR) or even both, a miner that mines the two different crypto currencies at the same time to give you better profit from your existing hardware.

item.title: UK Regulators Declare Start of
item.description:
UK Regulators Declare Start of

Christopher Woolard, Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) Director of Strategy and Competition, announced a regulatory sandbox for fintech companies, a first of its kind. Harriett Baldwin, Economic Secretary to the Treasury, described Bitcoin and Ethereum as "digital currencies" and proclaimed the start of a "beautiful friendship".

item.title: Money Partner Group Latest to Invest in Bitcoin Exchange Kraken
item.description:
Money Partner Group Latest to Invest in Bitcoin Exchange Kraken

The Tokyo-based company, which reportedly holds a market cap of over $USD260 million, confirmed its plans to further its business portfolio in digital currency sector, starting by offering Bitcoin trading and settlement services to its clients. Money Partners Group, one of the Japan's leading forex brokerage firms, has taken its first steps into the Bitcoin industry following an investment into Kraken.

item.title: What a Tech Startup's Pivots Say About Bitcoin's Future
item.description:
What a Tech Startup's Pivots Say About Bitcoin's Future

Those who want to understand exactly how bitcoin is being adopted in the U.S. would do well to take a look at tech startup Snapcard. The company has existed less than three years, but it's already reinvented itself twice, changing its business model to adjust to bitcoin's evolution.

item.title: The Latest Ethminer 0.9.41-genoil-1.0.7 Beta for Windows
item.description:
The Latest Ethminer 0.9.41-genoil-1.0.7 Beta for Windows

We have compiled a Windows binary (64-bit only) from the latest ethminer 0.9.41 Genoil fork 1.0.7 beta for Nvidia CUDA as well as AMD OpenCL mining of Ethereum ( source). The latest code comes with the addition of failover support for Stratum mode along with the already available in previous release failover support for the standard mining mode.

item.description:
Spend Bitcoin Online | Bitcoin.com

Buy Bitcoin, Create Bitcoin Wallets, Read Bitcoin News, and more, at Bitcoin.com

item.title: Has Bitcoin become the new ransom money?
item.description:
Has Bitcoin become the new ransom money?

When an Information Technology (IT) company in Mysuru recently became the target of a 'denial-of-service' attack, the attackers demanded Bitcoins in return for sharing the key to restore the company's computer systems. The attackers demanded management Bitcoins - virtual money through Bitcoin-dealing websites - in return for the key.

item.title: Cost of running Bitcore
item.description:
Cost of running Bitcore
